body.name: Wantdo Women's Hooded Warm Winter Coat Quilted Thicken Puffer Jacket with Removable Hood

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard (GRS) verifies the percentage of recycled content and tracks it from the source to the final product.

features: Care instructions Hand-wash and Machine washable

Recycled Fabric and Filling - The winter jacket for women is made with renewable fabric and filling, which requires far fewer resources than new fibers and generates fewer CO2 emissions. With a 3,000mm waterproof rating, the women's puffer coat keeps you dry in the rain or warm in snowy weather at all times

Against the Wind & Chill - Wear the women's puffer jacket to stay ultra comfy during winter. The warm winter coat for women is padded with a durable shell that ensures outstanding windproof and thermal properties, keeping you stay toasty warm all day long. Our outdoor apparel is suitable for a variety of activities, such as casual wear, outdoor work, travel, cycling, and hiking

Protective Thermal Properties - Pull the adjustable hood of the thickened coat up to keep your ears and face warm. The hooded puffer coat's collar, padding, ribbed elastic cuffs, and adjustable drawstring further keep you insulated against the frost

Always in Style - The women's winter coat is made available in 11 different modern and stunning colors. Choose from 6 sizes to ensure a custom, comfy, and figure-flattering fit, and show off your classic taste in clothing by sporting the zip-up jacket

Never Lose Things in The Snow - Count on the women's coat to help you enjoy the outdoors. It has 4 reinforced pockets for keeping all your essentials, keys, phones, wallet, and small items safe. Enjoy the outdoors with the ladies' puffer jacket that lets you keep everything within reach
body.description: Winter coats help insulate the heat and let you move as you please. What you need is a warm enough women's winter coat that doesn’t skimp on quality, performance, and style! Wearing a winter coat for women before heading outdoors is a must if you don't want to feel cold or cut your camping trip short. You'll need a windproof puffer jacket for women with features such as windproof cuffs, SBS zippers, and 3000MM waterproof index that can keep you warm and allow for a full range of motion at the same time to fully enjoy all the wonders winter has to offer. Recycled Fabric and Insulation - The women’s coat is made from recycled materials, providing excellent warmth without contributing to carbon emissions. Waterproof Protection - The waterproof puffer jacket has a waterproof rating of 3000mm, ensuring that you stay dry in the wettest conditions and making it an excellent choice for outdoor adventures. Pocket Features - The women’s puffer coat has two double-entry front patch pockets and two deep inner pockets to hold your valuables. Detachable Hood - The women’s puffer jacket has a detachable hood that offers versatility in different weather conditions, providing added convenience for storage and travel. Durable Zipper - The lady's winter coat features SBS zippers, ensuring durability and easy use for long-lasting wear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Our mission is to build products that are essentials of active performance wear for our users. We want to create products that are wearable in a lot of different conditions, whether one wears it to hike in the mountains, or stroll around town. By making active performance wear with features such as waterproof, stain-repellent, fast-drying, and warm, Wantdo becomes a daily essential in our customers' lives. Recycled Winter Coat 3000mm Index Waterproof Puffer Coat Windproof and Warm Down Alternative Jacket Removable Hood Puffer Jacket Multi-pockets Short Winter Jacket Women’s Coat with Smooth Zipper Women's Winter Jackets are Available in a Variety of Colors Winter coats help insulate the heat and let you move as you please. What you need is a warm enough women's winter coat that doesn’t skimp on quality, performance, and style! Wearing a winter coat for women before heading outdoors is a must if you don't want to feel cold or cut your camping trip short. You'll need a windproof puffer jacket for women with features such as windproof cuffs, SBS zippers, and 3000MM waterproof index that can keep you warm and allow for a full range of motion at the same time to fully enjoy all the wonders winter has to offer. Recycled Fabric and Insulation - The women’s coat is made from recycled materials, providing excellent warmth without contributing to carbon emissions. Waterproof Protection - The waterproof puffer jacket has a waterproof rating of 3000mm, ensuring that you stay dry in the wettest conditions and making it an excellent choice for outdoor adventures. Pocket Features - The women’s puffer coat has two double-entry front patch pockets and two deep inner pockets to hold your valuables. Detachable Hood - The women’s puffer jacket has a detachable hood that offers versatility in different weather conditions, providing added convenience for storage and travel. Durable Zipper - The lady's winter coat features SBS zippers, ensuring durability and easy use for long-lasting wear.

4-layer Thick Construction for Ultra Warmth The women’s windproof winter coat is comfortable, so it won’t slow you down. Enjoy form and function while you’re knee-deep through your snowy adventures. At the same time, the down alternative jacket featuring 4-layer thick construction keeps you warm against the chilly breeze. Recycled Raw Materials The women’s puffer coat is made with recycled materials. Extracting and processing virgin materials takes a toll on land, water, and air. To do our part, Wantdo is moving toward renewable and recycled raw materials. Using recycled polyester lessens our dependence on fossil fuels and keeps plastic bottles out of landfills. It is a wise choice to choose to buy a women’s puffer jacket made from recycled fabrics. 3000mm Index Waterproof Protection The women’s waterproof winter jacket has a waterproof fabric with an index of 3000mm that keeps you dry and comfortable all day, you can continue your outdoor activities on heavy fog, rainy, or snow days. The waterproof puffer coat for women provides warmth and keeps you dry in damp or cold weather. Superior Cold Protection The women’s warm puffer jacket is filled with premium fluffy synthetic fibers that limit air circulation while preserving your body heat. This means you can enjoy ice skating at the park or hiking around the Rockies without getting distracted by cold winds or chills. The women’s parka jacket is also not only protective against water, wind, and cold but it can also be customized to flatter any body type.

Security Pocket The women’s heavy winter coat is designed with convenience in mind, featuring two deep inner pockets. The inner pockets safeguard items that you want to secure the elements. Whether it's for enjoying going for a walk or shopping, the women’s thick puffer jacket has got your storage needs covered. Removable Hood The ladies' winter coat performs well against mild wind, snow, and cold, and gets you full body protection. The adjustable and detachable hood effectively prevents gusts of cold winds. The hood of the women’s warm jacket also can be removed for those not-so-cold winter days. Snap Hand Pockets The warm puffer jacket features 2 snap pockets. You can place your hands in the slanted pockets to keep them nice and snug. These are also perfect for storing essentials. Keep everything you need within reach. You don't have to worry about winter days ruining your adventure in various activities.

Wantdo Recycled Women’s Puffer Jacket Collection 604W The women’s winter coat combined with warmth, flexibility, and functionality. Responsibly Sourced The winter coat for women is sourced from recycled raw materials and has a lower impact on the environment than traditional textiles. Women's puffer jackets made from recycled fabric are not only high quality but also low carbon. They are manufactured using sustainable materials and help create a greener planet. More Than Just A Winter Coat The hooded women's coat does a great job of keeping you warm, but that's not all. It's also fitted with several pockets, including hand-warming and buttoned slits. The women's jacket can be worn on more than one occasion. Made for comfort, you can easily use them to go shopping in town, work, or attend class, even in non-sub-zero weather. Waterproof & Windproof Protection The women's warm winter jacket features an adjustable drawstring on the hood, allowing for a customized fit and secure positioning. The drawstring can be tightened or loosened to suit individual preferences, ensuring both warmth and comfort. The ladies' winter coat also effectively protects against outside moisture seeping through on rainy days and cold weather. Made to Last Wear a women's hooded puffer jacket every day with the utmost confidence. The down alternative coat is designed to withstand wind, water, tears, and abrasion. The quilting of the women's coat provides added strength to the fabric. Function and Form in One The women's warm winter coat brings together comfort and impeccable style. Enjoy form and function while you’re knee-deep through your snowy adventures. You also get your pick of size and color as the puffer jacket for women comes in a wide variety of stunning hues, all of which will look fantastic against the natural backdrop of the great outdoors. Versatile Puffer Coat The women's puffer coat pairs well with your favorite shirt, sweater, or sweatshirt. Take the hooded jacket for women with you whenever you go on holiday travels, outdoor adventures, camping trips, or whenever you play winter sports. Make a stylish statement whenever you head outdoors on a cold day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honest "plus size" review...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coat to wear to NYC in December. I am Texas born and raised so I don't do well in the cold. I'm 5'9" and 250lbs. I got the size 3XL. This was the most comfortable and flattering coat out of the 4 different ones that I tried. I love this coat! The sleeves are long and cuffed which keeps your hands and arms very warm even without wearing gloves. The upper arms are very roomy and do not feel tight nor too baggy. The pockets are freakishly deep, I was able to carry a ridiculous amount of necessities while I traveled, including my hat, gloves, and a water bottle among other items. I hated the hood because it's awkwardly shaped and I honestly just threw it away. It is water resistant and insulated so I'd feel very confident wearing it in sleet and snow. The length was perfect to cover my stomach and backside; keeping cold air from coming up into the bottom of the coat. The only problem I actually experienced was with HOW WARM it actually is. When indoors or on the subway I would begin to overheat because it WAS so warm LOL! I would buy this again for sure, and wish I had tried it first before I wasted my time trying on 3 other coats. Can't wait to use it in the snow next!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and material!!
reviews.reviewText: Weather got cold quick where I live and I needed a coat. Got this within just a couple days and couldn’t be happier! The price was perfect, the cuffed sleeves are a plus and will definitely keep any air from going up. The hood is just big enough you could still wear a hat and be able to throw the hood up real quick and if you don’t want the hood you can easily unzip it. Loose fit at waist but adjustable strap to make it more fit.Material is soft but very warm! For reference I am 5’4” and 152 lbs 36C bra size and got a large 😁 hope this helps someone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want more colors
reviews.reviewText: Best jacket I’ve owned so far. It’s so warm, cute, flattering, and comfortable!!! I got the army green color and want the black one next !!! I am 5’6 and approx 120/125 pounds and ordered medium. I am glad I did because it fits perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Living in the south I don’t ever thing about a thick winter coat. After the last cold front I decided it was time to get one. I sized up so I’d be able to wear a hoodie or sweater underneath without it being to tight. The jacket is great! Keeps your warm without being too warm. The detachable hood is a huge plus ( I can’t stand hoods and wearing my hair down) only down side is since it’s puffy it make noise as you move around but I’d definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After looking for jackets everywhere, this is the nicest warmest and reasonably priced jacket I have found. They don't make things like they used to but this looks well made and extremely warm. A little tighter than I usually wear but nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So warm and so comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed by the style, fit, and warmth of this jacket! I’m tall, so jackets typically aren’t long enough for me but this one is the perfect length. I also live where it is currently 30° everyday and I stay nice and warm in this jacket. For reference I’m 5’10” 155 lbs and I got a medium. Go one size up if you want to be able to wear sweatshirts or chunky sweaters underneath. I can’t recommend this coat highly enough!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a really nice coat, well made and thick. However I question the size. I ordered a 3x which should have fit me perfectly but I found the shoulder a bit snug and I couldn't zip up. So now I have two coats to be returned. Finding a nice coat w/o a hood seems to be difficult for a plus sized woman but I will keep trying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PURCHASE YET!!
reviews.reviewText: I buy A LOT of products off Amazon, but this coat has to be my absolute favorite purchase yet. The coat is a matte black. I absolutely love the material. I walk dogs so it gets dirty, but I just take a wet wipe over it and it works great to clean it. It’s wipes off so easy, because of the material it doesn’t get pushed and caked into it. It’s so warm and it looks amazing. The pockets are deep and they can be buttoned together for extra security. There’s a pocket on the inside of the coat as well. When you zip it up all the way, it will protect your neck completely. I love that the good comes on and off. I never write reviews, but I’m so in love with this purchase!

This is my second winter coat I purchased through this company and honestly it will be my go to for most coats from now on. My first coat lasted almost three years of rough wear which I wasn’t expecting. This coat feels warm, fits perfectly, and the seams all beautiful sewn. I ordered a large and the tag ment to cut off says larger but the rage sewd to the coat itself says medium. I even got my boyfriend to order his coat from this company so I’ll do a review with that one comes in also!

I love this jacket. It is comfy and roomy. I ordered a medium because of reviews. I usually take a large. I'm glad. I didn't order a large because the medium is plenty. I like the drawstring hidden at the waist to make it more windproof. I love the colour. I plan to add fur lining to the hood! It is not quite fitted, but the drawstring helps.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this coat!! Very warm. Looks great on.
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend this coat. Comfortable, with warm deep pockets. I’m always nervous when purchasing clothing of any kind online without being able to see or touch it, but this pretty good quality. Phew 😅.
This jacket is thin af. I opened it and it didn’t even have a hood. Definitely disappointed considering I walk everywhere and it’s freezing out and now I gotta wait to get a new one

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as puffy as the picture (thank goodness!)
reviews.reviewText: When I saw the picture, I was worried I'd look like a wine-flavored marshmallow, but it's fits wonderfully.The pocket for the phone is great, I like how the opening is along the inner seam and not cut across, which will probably help with durability. There's another lower-down inner pocket perfect for reading glasses.It's cozy, tested at about 1C for me so far, and the pockets keep my bare hands relatively warm at that temp.The color is a tad brighter than the pictures, depending on your computer I suppose, but still a nice burgundy.
